title: Himegami no Miko - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   School Life   Supernatural   Yuri
author: Uetake Sumio
description: Himeko Kurusugawa and Chikane Himemiya are two high-school girls at the prestigious Ototachibana Academy in the fictional Japanese village of Mahoroba. They are also the reincarnations of the solar and lunar mikos. When their ancient enemy the Orochi (the eight-headed Yamata no Orochi of Japanese folklore) rises once more the girlsâ€™ long-sealed personas awaken to defend the world!>
